ESP.ORIGINAL: Josh Sawyer - TTW tweaks by Roy Batty for compatibility and balance changes

ScriptName DLC03RadAbsorbScript
Float MicroRegen
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate Set MicroRegen to ScriptEffectElapsedSeconds / 2 RestoreAv RadiationRads MicroRegen End

scn GSChemistrySetScript
short Button
begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player ShowMessage GSChemistrySetMsg endif
end
BEGIN MenuMode 1001
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button == 1 ) player.AddItem JSawyerStimpakHomemade 4 SetDestroyed 1 elseif ( Button == 2 ) player.AddItem Psycho 1 player.AddItem Buffout 1 player.AddItem Mentats 1 player.AddItem NVSteadyChem 1 player.AddItem NVReboundChem 1 SetDestroyed 1 endif
END

scn NVDLC01MQ01Script ; JSH 10.06.10 ; Quest script for NVDLC01MQ01.
;Variables for Act Completion short bAct1Complete short bAct2Complete short bAct3Complete
; Elijah has sent his initial greeting to the player short bElijahGreetingDone
; Player has picked up command tape short bDogNoteAcquired
; Dog freed from his jail cell short bDogFreed
; Calculate XP for the DLC - CES 10/14/10 short bXPDoOnce ;This Variable runs the code once short iNVDLC01Act1FinalXP short iNVDLC01Act2FinalXP short iNVDLC01Act3FinalXP
short bRadioControl ; RLee, 10/22/10 - Added control variable to toggle FNV radios off and DLC radios on. See NVDLC01Ending for change-back. short bRadioNV short bCountryRadio ref rCountryRadio
;JES 7/21/12 - Reducing all granted XP by 66%. Levels over 35 ignored due to JSawyer level cap.
BEGIN Gamemode
if (bXPDoOnce == 0) set bXPDOOnce to 1
if (Player.GetLevel < 5)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 3000 ;JES - Now 1000 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (1000 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (1000 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (1000 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 10)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 5000 ;JES - Now 1666 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (1666 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (1666 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (1666 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 15)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 7500 ;JES - Now 2500 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (2500 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (2500 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (2500 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 20)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 10000 ;JES - Now 3333 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (3333 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (3333 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (3333 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 25)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 12000 ;JES - Now 4000 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (4000 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (4000 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (4000 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 30)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 14000 ;JES - Now 4666 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (4666 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (4666 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (4666 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 35)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 16000 ;JES - Now 5333 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (5333 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (5333 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (5333 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 40)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 18000 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (18000 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (18000 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (18000 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 45)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 21000 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (21000 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (21000 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (21000 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
else
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 22000 set NVDLC01Act1XP to (22000 * NVDLC01Act1XPPercentage / 5) set NVDLC01Act2XP to (22000 * NVDLC01Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC01Act3XP to (22000 * NVDLC01Act3XPPercentage / 7)
endif
set iNVDLC01Act1FinalXP to NVDLC01Act1XP * 2 set iNVDLC01Act2FinalXP to NVDLC01Act2XP * 2 set iNVDLC01Act3FinalXP to NVDLC01Act3XP * 2
endif
if (bRadioControl == 0)
RNVTARef.Disable; ;Disable Radio New Vegas set rCountryRadio to vCountryRadioREF.GetLinkedRef; ;Country Radio has no ref name, so getlinked rCountryRadio.Disable; ;Disable Country Radio
NVDLC01Bartender.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; ;Set up hologram vendors to show subtitles NVDLC01HologramVendor1REF.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; NVDLC01HologramVendor2REF.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; NVDLC01HologramVendor3REF.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; NVDLC01HoloDealer03.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; NVDLC01HoloDealer02.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; NVDLC01HoloDealer01.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; NVDLC01ChristineREF.AlwaysShowActorSubtitles 1; StarletHologramVillaRef.SetNPCRadio 1 NVDLC01RadioStationRef; ;Start up the Starlet Hologram playing the Starlet Radio audio at the fountain
; NVDLC01RadioEnable ; Disable FNV Radio Stations on quest startup NVDLC01RadioStationChristineREF.enable; StartQuest NVDLC01RadioChristine; NVDLC01RadioStationDeanREF.enable; StartQuest NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest; NVDLC01RadioStationDogREF.enable; StartQuest NVDLC01RadioDog; NVDLC01RadioStationSpeakersREF.enable; StartQuest NVDLC01RadioSpeakers; ; Elijah's talking activator gets activated in specific locations StartQuest NVDLC01RadioElijah; NVDLC01RadioStationDeanMusicREF.enable; NVDLC01RadioStationDeanMusicREF.SetBroadcastState 1; StartQuest NVDLC01RadioDeanMusic;
set bRadioControl to 1; endif
END

scn NVDLC01ChipRewardSCRIPT
;This script controls the Sierra Madre Chip reward after completing NVDLC01 ;CES 10/26/10
;Variables
short bChipsRewarded short iTotalRewards float fChipDelay float fCloudResidueDelay
short bCompsRewarded short iTotalComps float fCompsDelay
BEGIN GameMode
if (NVDLC01ElijahsChemistrySetREF.bResidueGathered == 1) if (GameDaysPassed > fCloudResidueDelay ) set NVDLC01ElijahsChemistrySetREF.bResidueGathered to 1 NVDLC01ElijahsChemistrySetREF.SetDestroyed 0 endif endif
if (bChipsRewarded == 1) if (GameDaysPassed > fChipDelay) set bChipsRewarded to 0 endif else NVDLC01ElijahsDropboxREF.additem NVDLC01SierraMadreChip 100 set bChipsRewarded to 1 set iTotalRewards to iTotalRewards + 1 set fChipDelay to GameDaysPassed + 3 endif
;CES 1/04/11 - Updating this to only happen when you have triggered the HUGE reward ;JES 12/28/11 - Commenting out NVDLC01FinalCompVoucher in favor of reduced reward to preserve economy (kinda) if (NVDLC01CasinoComps.bHuge == 1) if (bCompsRewarded == 1) if (GameDaysPassed > fCompsDelay) set bCompsRewarded to 0 endif else ;NVDLC01ElijahsDropboxREF.additem NVDLC01FinalCompVoucher 1 NVDLC01ElijahsDropboxREF.additem NVDLC01SierraMadreChip 25 set bCompsRewarded to 1 set iTotalComps to iTotalComps + 1 set fCompsDelay to GameDaysPassed + 3 endif endif
END ;GameMode

SCN NVDLC02XPCalculatorSCRIPT
; Calculate XP for the DLC - TS 11/12/10 short bXPDoOnce ;This Variable runs the code once short iNVDLC02Act1FinalXP short iNVDLC02Act2FinalXP short iNVDLC02Act3FinalXP
BEGIN GameMode
; JES 7/21/12 - Reducing all granted XP by 66%. Levels over 35 ignored due to JSawyer level cap.
; XP REWARD CALC if (bXPDoOnce == 0) set bXPDOOnce to 1
if (Player.GetLevel < 5)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 3000 ;JES - Now 1000 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (1000 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (1000 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (1000 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 75
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 10)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 5000 ;JES - Now 1666 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (1666 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (1666 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (1666 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 125
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 15)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 7500 ;JES - Now 2500 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (2500 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (2500 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (2500 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 175
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 20)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 10000 ;JES - Now 3333 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (3333 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (3333 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (3333 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 250
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 25)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 12000 ;JES - Now 4000 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (4000 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (4000 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (4000 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 300
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 30)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 14000 ;JES - Now 4666 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (4666 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (4666 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (4666 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 350
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 35)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 16000 ;JES - Now 5333 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (5333 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (5333 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (5333 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 400
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 40)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 18000 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (18000 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (18000 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (18000 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 450
elseif (Player.GetLevel < 45)
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 21000 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (21000 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (21000 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (21000 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 525
else
;Total XP Awarded should be approximately 22000 set NVDLC02Act1XP to (22000 * NVDLC02Act1XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act2XP to (22000 * NVDLC02Act2XPPercentage / 6) set NVDLC02Act3XP to (22000 * NVDLC02Act3XPPercentage / 2) set NVDLC02SecondaryQuestXP to 550
endif
set iNVDLC02Act1FinalXP to NVDLC02Act1XP * 2 set iNVDLC02Act2FinalXP to NVDLC02Act2XP * 2 set iNVDLC02Act3FinalXP to NVDLC02Act3XP * 1.375
endif
END

scn JSawyerChallengeNeverAxedForThisPerk
int irank
begin ScriptEffectStart set iRank to Player.HasPerk JSawyerNeverAxedForThisPerk if iRank < 2 set iRank to Player.AddPerk JSawyerNeverAxedForThisPerk ShowMessage JSawyerChallengeMessageAxed iRank endif if iRank > 1 RemoveRecurringFromChallenge JSawyerChallengeINeverAxedForThis endif end

ESP.TRADUIT: 受辐射的苏格兰威士忌

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。
预购13号避难所水壶任务

ESP.ORIGINAL:
; PERK - NVDLC03ImplantGRXPerk ("Implant GRX") Index (10) ; RANK - 1
Player.AddItem NVDLC03ImplantGRX 2 Set NVDLC03GenericPerkQUEST.nImplantGRXRank to 1

; PERK - NVDLC03ImplantGRXPerk ("Implant GRX") Index (11) ; RANK - 2
Set NVDLC03GenericPerkQUEST.nImplantGRXRank to 2 Player.RemoveItem NVDLC03ImplantGRX 10 1 Player.AddItem NVDLC03ImplantGRX 3 1
With each rank of this perk, all of your Explosives weapons do an additional 10% damage and have 10% larger area of effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个能力每升一级, 所有爆破类武器都能提升20%的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Ninja perk grants you the power of the fabled shadow warriors. When attacking with either Melee or Unarmed, you gain a +15% critical chance on every strike. Sneak attack criticals do 25% more damage than normal.
ESP.TRADUIT: “忍者”这个能力将赋予你传说中暗影武士的力量。施展徒手或近战攻击时，你的暴击率提高15%。潜行状态下打出的暴击伤害提高25%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Lead Belly perk, you take 50% less radiation when consuming irradiated food and drink. You are also able to eat raw animal meat without suffering ST loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拥有铅肚皮这个能力，在饮用放射性的水源时, 你受到的辐射量会减少50％。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do 20% more damage when using any revolver, lever-action firearm, dynamite, knife, or hatchet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你使用左轮手枪、杠杆式火器、炸药、刀或斧头时，你造成的伤害提高20%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meltdown causes foes killed by your plasma weapons to give off a corona of harmful energy. Note: this can cause a chain reaction.
ESP.TRADUIT: “炉心熔毁”能力会让你在使用能量武器杀死敌人时，从尸体上爆发出有害的能量波。注意，这可能引发连锁反应。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All Melee Weapons (except thrown) and Unarmed attacks have a chance of knocking your target down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的近战武器（除了投掷武器）和徒手攻击都有机会将目标打晕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Piercing Strike makes all of your Unarmed and Melee Weapons (including thrown) negate 15 points of Damage Threshold on the target.
ESP.TRADUIT: “力透重铠”会让你的徒手和近战攻击（包括投掷武器）抵消掉目标的15点伤害豁免。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The slayer walks the earth! The speed of all Melee Weapons and Unarmed attacks is increased by 30%.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是世上一流的屠夫！所有近战武器和徒手攻击的速度上升30%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your martial might is truly legendary. You do a large amount of additional damage through enemy blocks with all Melee Weapons and Unarmed attacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的勇武万夫莫敌。在施展近战与徒手攻击时，你对正在格挡的敌人造成的伤害将大幅增加。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gain +10 Damage Threshold against all Melee Weapons and Unarmed attacks and cannot be knocked down in combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对所有近战和徒手攻击的伤害豁免提升+10点，并且无法在战斗中被击倒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're just so excited about plasma that you can't (magnetically) contain yourself! The AP costs for all plasma weapons (including Plasma Grenades) are reduced by 20%. You also attack 20% faster with the same weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你醉心于电浆的魅力，仿佛它的磁力吸引着你，让你无法自拔！所有的电浆武器（包括电浆手雷）的行动点消耗下降20%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're deep in enemy territory, you just start chucking grenades and hope for the best. All Explosives have a 25% larger area of effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一深入敌阵，就开始四处丢雷，希望能炸出一道亮丽的风景线。所有爆破武器的杀伤范围提高25%。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Elijah obviously intended this to go to Veronica, but you earned it, right?
You've learned Elijah's secret Melee Weapon technique and your Critical Hits now do 50% more damage.
ESP.TRADUIT:
以利亚明显想把这招传授给维罗妮卡，但这是你应得的，对吧？
你学会了以利亚的近战秘笈，你的致命一击将造成50%的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just good, honest infantry work! You do 20% more damage with 9mm and .45 Auto Pistols and SMGs, Service Rifles, Assault Carbines, Battle Rifles, Light Machine Guns, Frag Grenades, Grenade Rifles and Launchers, and Combat Knives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的步兵经历让你受益匪浅！在使用9mm手枪和冲锋枪、.45自动手枪和冲锋枪、现役步枪、突击步枪、神射手步枪、轻机枪、破片手雷、榴弹步枪和榴弹发射器、以及战斗道具时，你造成的伤害增加25%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Atomic! perk, you are 25% faster and stronger whenever you're basking in the warm glow of radiation. Outside irradiated areas, your Action Points (AP) regenerate faster and faster the higher your level of radiation sickness becomes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拥有“原子！”能力，当你受到辐射时，你的速度和力量增强25%。当你没有受到辐射时，你的辐射病等级越高，行动点数（AP）回复得越快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any living creature you kill has a 15% chance to have the potent healing items Thin Red Paste or Blood Sausage when looted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见人吃人，见鬼吃鬼！你杀死任何生物时，有15%几率会掉落治疗品稀血酱或血肠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gain a non-addictive subdermal Turbo (chem) injector. This perk may be taken twice, with the second rank increasing the effect from 2 to 3 seconds and the uses per day from 2 to 3. [Activated in the Pip-Boy inventory.]
ESP.TRADUIT: 你获得了一个不会上瘾的增压剂注射器（药物）。这个perk能升2级，第2级能把效果从2秒提高为3秒，把每天的使用次数从5次提升到10次 [已在哔哔小子物品栏启用]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your knowledge of robotic components allows you to break them more easily and salvage their mechanical corpses. You have a +25% chance to score critical hits against robots, and you'll also find more useful components on robots you destroy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你积累了大量关于机器人结构的知识，现在你能更轻易破坏它们并重新回收它们身上的机械零件。你增加了25%对机器人的暴击率，并且在已摧毁的机器人身上将获得更多有用的组件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're so sneaky that you can sneak even with your Pip-Boy light on! Any time the Pip-Boy light is on, you gain a sneak bonus to offset the light's sneak penalty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真狡猾，现在就算你的哔哔小子开着灯你也能正常潜行了！如果哔哔小子的灯亮着，你将获得一个潜行奖励以抵消灯光造成的潜行惩罚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Minor bonus to critically hit with Hatchets, Throwing Hatchets, Tomahawks, Proton Axes, Proton Throwing Axes, Protonic Inversal Axes, and Protonic Inversal Throwing Axes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对斧头、投掷斧头、战斧、质子斧、投掷质子斧、反质子斧、投掷反质子小的暴击加成

ESP.ORIGINAL:
JSawyer is loaded.
Notes: * USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. * This mod *must* be applied at the start of the game to have full effect. Do not apply mid-game or you will get errors! * This mod requires the base game and all DLCs: Dead Money, Honest Hearts, Old World Blues, Lonesome Road, Gun Runners' Arsenal, and Courier's Stash (Pre-Order DLCs). * This mod must be used with a load order manager and must be loaded after all of the above .esms. * This is an enduser difficulty tweak and general bugfixing mod, not an official patch or product.
Caravan Pack, Classic Pack, Mercenary Pack, and Tribal Pack unique items placed in the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 商队包、经典包、佣兵包和部落包中的特殊物品已经分散在废土上

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the I Never Axed for This perk (Rank %.0f)
Cause damage with Hatchets, Throwing Hatchets, Tomahawks, Proton Axes, Proton Throwing Axes, Protonic Inversal Axes, and Protonic Inversal Throwing Axes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用斧头、投掷斧头、战斧、质子斧、投掷质子斧、反质子斧、投掷反质子斧造成伤害
戴尔·巴顿的商队牌牌组
小巴斯特的商队牌牌组
